Today in County Sligo, surf is small and quiet at 2 ft @9s N with a light 6 mph ENE wind; not producing much. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 2 ft @11s N and light 1 mph SE winds, offering some fun at Dunmoran Strand and Lackan Bay during the mid-day push. The day after, swell picks up to 6 ft @8s NNW with light 6 mph WSW winds, creating great conditions at spots like Easkey and Inishcrone. Best: day after.
